word_mean: 色彩所呈现的质的面貌，是色彩彼此之间相互区别的标志。

sentence.Network_en: His hair has reverted back to its original copper hue.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的头发又变回原来的淡红棕色。

sentence.Network_en: His face took on an unhealthy whitish hue.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的脸上透出一丝病态的苍白。

sentence.Network_en: The diamond shone with every hue under the sun.
sentence.Network_cn: 金刚石在阳光下放出五颜六色的光芒.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 把色调(Hue)设为85，饱和度(Sat)设为90,亮度(Lum)设为205.(出厂时一般设为160-0-240)单击添加到自定义颜色(Addtocustomcolors)…
色相（hue），饱和度又被称为纯度、彩度（saturation Value），亮度（明度）（bright）u 色相：是一种色彩区别于另一种色彩的表 …
顺化 (hue): 越南最后一个王朝的都城如何去: 坐上open ticket 的空调大巴, 晚上8点出发, 第二天上午约 10 点到达, 中间停车若干次.

list.abs: 花卉术语标准 - 世外园林 ... 3．6．16 冷色调 cool colour tone 3．6．17 明色调 brilliant hue 3．6．18 常绿篱 evergreen hedge.
circle的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... hour circle 时刻度环, 时圈, 子午线 hue circle 色相环 image circle 图象圈.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hīw, hēow (also 'form, appearance', obsolete except in Scots), of Germanic origin; related to Swedish hy 'skin, complexion'. The sense 'colour, shade' dates from the mid 19th cent

example.ex: The same hue will look different in different light.
example.tran: 同一颜色在不同的光线下看起来会有所不同。

example.ex: ...a selection of tops in natural hues and fibres.
example.tran: 一批自然色彩和纤维的上衣

entry.def: If people raise a hue and cry about something, they protest angrily about it.

example.ex: Just as the show ended, he heard a huge hue and cry outside.
example.tran: 演出刚结束，他就听到外面愤怒的高声抗议。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of a color as determined by its dominant wavelength
1. take on color or become colored;
